2025-08-20PMOPublic Service Employment ActAppointment of the Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Operations), Privy Council Office.Appointment of Eric Costen of Arnprior, Ontario, to be Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Operations), Privy Council Office, to hold office during pleasure, effective September 2, 2025.N/A
subject: Appointment of the Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Operations), Privy Council Office.
precis: Appointment of Eric Costen of Arnprior, Ontario, to be Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Operations), Privy Council Office, to hold office during pleasure, effective September 2, 2025.
